posts.post_content:
Staff+
  
[Bloom Tender](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Bloom Tender ) (With 5 colors on the field)
  
[Elvish Archdruid](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Elvish Archdruid ) (With 4 other elves)
  
[Harabaz Druid](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Harabaz Druid ) (With 4 other Allies)
  
[Magus of the Coffers](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Magus of the Coffers ) (With 7+ Swamps)
  
[Metalworker](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Metalworker ) (With 3+ Artifacts)
  
[Priest of Titania](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Priest of Titania ) (With 4 other Elves)
  
[Rofellos, Llanowar Emissary](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Rofellos, Llanowar Emissary ) (With 5+ forests)
  
[Viridian Joiner](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Viridian Joiner ) (With 5+ power)
  
[Wirewood Channeler](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Wirewood Channeler ) (With 4 other Elves)
  
   
All equal Infinite mana, and will win you the game.

posts.post_content:
As long as you can tap for 5 mana with whichever creature you have all the mana you could want of whatever color that creature made, not to mention tapping any number of creatures, gaining as much life as you want, and drawing as many cards as you like from the staff itself.
  
Easily broken and deserves more than a 3.8 in my opinion.
posts.html:

Easily broken and deserves more than a 3.8 in my opinion.

Posted By: Spideredd (1/10/2010 2:13:45 PM)
Rating:

posts.post_content: This is likely the best "finisher" of any combo deck that gets infinate mana. There's TONS of ways of getting unlimited mana, from using Bloom Tender and Rofellos to an off the wall combo involving Channel, Lich's Mirror and Mirror of Fate. The best for any deck (since its colorless and uses 2 nice utility cards) is likely [Brighthearth Rings](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Brighthearth Rings) and [Basalt Monolith](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Basalt Monolith).
posts.html:
This is likely the best "finisher" of any combo deck that gets infinate mana. There's TONS of ways of getting unlimited mana, from using Bloom Tender and Rofellos to an off the wall combo involving Channel, Lich's Mirror and Mirror of Fate. The best for any deck (since its colorless and uses 2 nice utility cards) is likely Brighthearth Rings and Basalt Monolith.

posts.post_content: you can use other infinite mana combos to fuel it too, like [power artifact](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=power artifact) and any of like 20 artifacts (1 example is [Grim Monolith](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Grim Monolith)), [mana reflection](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=mana reflection) does it too, with those artifacts. such an underused card in EDH, dont know why either
